devdoc.details: A contract for managing a registry of validators.

addValidator(address).details: Adds a new validator to the registry.

params._validator: The address of the validator to be added.

isValidator(address).details: Checks if an address is a validator.
isValidator(address).return: A boolean indicating whether the address is a validator.

removeValidator(address).details: Removes a validator from the registry.
